[[inst_hl_lwui_upr]]
==== HL.LWUI.UPR

*Syntax:* hl.lwui.upr [SrcL, simm], ->Dst0, Dst1

*Description:* Long immediate variant supporting extended address range (48-bit).

image::../generated/encodings/enc_hl_lwui_upr.svg[HL.LWUI.UPR encoding,width=800]
